mapper.select: select id as id,user_id as userId,type as type,log_content as logContent, create_by as createBy, create_time as createTime,update_by as updateBy, update_time as updateTime from emp_log where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime}
mapper.delete: delete from emp_log where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <=#{endTime}
